values.title: Markus Herz
values.desc: Be careful about reading health books Some fine day youll die of a misprint

values.title: Tony DeLiso
values.desc: Keep your best wishes close to your heart and watch what happens

values.title: Hippocrates
values.desc: Let food be thy medicine and medicine be thy food

values.title: Mary Berry
values.desc: Cakes are healthy too you just eat a small slice

values.title: Jess C Scott
values.desc: A fit healthy bodythat is the best fashion statement

values.title: Tricia Cunningham
values.desc: The individual who says it is not possible should move out of the way of those doing it

values.title: Kurt Vonnegut
values.desc: We are healthy only to the extent that our ideas are humane

values.title: Tony DeLiso
values.desc: Happiness is part of who we are Joy is the feeling

values.title: Winston S Churchill
values.desc: Healthy citizens are the greatest asset any country can have

values.title: Louis Pasteur
values.desc: Wine is the most healthful and most hygienic of beverages

values.title: Criss Jami
values.desc: An overindulgence of anything even something as pure as water can intoxicate

values.title: Steve Maraboli
values.desc: By choosing healthy over skinny you are choosing selflove over selfjudgment. You are beautiful
